pr_title: Fix issue with zoom column commands

timeline.message: Hide and show columns when zooming on a specified tab
hide additional source columns when zooming on left or right column
fix bug where left column wouldn't resize properly
restore correct widths of source columns
ensure the correct source is made visible on ensureVisible
set a state for source columns
code clean up and add comments

timeline.bodyText: Do we have an issue open on this?
timeline.author: jmcphers

timeline.bodyText: Nit: addAll will do this in one line
timeline.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: Doesn't addAll only do a shallow copy though?
replies.author: melissa-barca

replies.bodyText: IntelliJ also recommends replacing with addAll.
replies.author: gtritchie

replies.bodyText: It does do a shallow copy, but this loop also does a shallow copy.
replies.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: You're right, but I think it's ok because this gets passed as a final parameter. I've updated to follow your nit.
replies.author: melissa-barca
